name: Daily Site Improvement Planner
description: Creates a focused plan of site improvements for the day based on metrics, backlog items, and constraints.
when_to_use: Use each morning to turn site metrics and backlog items into a single actionable plan for the day.

inputs.metrics: GA4/Search Console summary for the site
inputs.backlog: List of candidate ideas as strings or structured backlog items
inputs.constraints: Execution constraints like available time, risk tolerance, and whether design or code is allowed

outputs.selected_task: Highest leverage task to deliver today
outputs.acceptance_criteria: List of acceptance checks for completion
outputs.rollback_plan: Steps to revert if the change underperforms
